name: Cat Inside
description:
A brief description:



1. This is a puzzle game.

2. 4 stages with different style , puzzles and hidden items.

3. There is an orange cat in the game.

4. There's a girl in the game

5. There's an orange cat in the game - it's you.



That's all before i think out more.

PS:Disconnect your joystick when you play with keyboard.
